Body:
pid = 2347
async with connect_dummy(Commands.execute_process_echo_asdf, pid) as client:
    event = asyncio.Event()
    counter = 0

    async def on_stdout(_pid, fileno, chunk):
        nonlocal counter
        expect = [(pid, process.STDOUT, b'asdf\n'), (pid, process.STDOUT, b'')]
        assert (_pid, fileno, chunk) == expect[counter]
        counter += 1
        if counter == len(expect):
            event.set()
    assert await client.execute_process('echo', 'asdf', on_stdout=on_stdout
        ) == pid
    await event.wait()
pytest.mark.asyncio
